verses.name: Job 25:1
verses.text: Then answered Bildad the Shuhite, and said,

verses.name: Job 25:2
verses.text: Dominion and fear are with him, he maketh peace in his high places.

verses.name: Job 25:3
verses.text: Is there any number of his armies? and upon whom doth not his light arise?

verses.name: Job 25:4
verses.text: How then can man be justified with God? or how can he be clean that is born of a woman?

verses.name: Job 25:5
verses.text: Behold even to the moon, and it shineth not; yea, the stars are not pure in his sight.

verses.name: Job 25:6
verses.text: How much less man, that is a worm? and the son of man, which is a worm?
